item.title: Sound Effects and Mix Specialist Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Deliverables 8 x 30 second edits (lifestyle, beach, sea, surf, yacht situations). THIS IS FOR Anyone talented that wants to ENhanCE Their SHOWREEL

We are seeking a talented sound effects and mix specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of sound design principles and the ability to create high-quality sound effects that enhance the overall audio experience. You will be responsible for creating and editing sound effects for various projects, including films, animations, video games, and commercials. Additionally, you will collaborate with our audio team to ensure the seamless integration of sound effects into the final mix.   

Skills required:

- Proficiency in sound design software such as Pro Tools or Adobe Audition
- Strong knowledge of sound editing techniques
- Ability to work collaboratively with a team
- Attention to detail and a keen ear for sound quality
- Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

One week. We are looking for an intermediate-level sound effects and mix specialist with a passion for creating immersive soundscapes.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 05:09 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Audio Effects, Sound Mixing
Skills: Audio Editing, Audio Effects, Sound Mixing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Creating a short video to showcase a website using editing and transitions - Upwork
item.description:
Hi skilled editor,
The required video is a to be a video showcasing a section of a website that spans about 15 seconds. The video is to be a scrolling screen capture of the website shown in a 1500x1080 viewport where it will take 7 seconds to scroll through the first 2 sections of the website until it reaches the video- at which point I want the video to the actual video file that is on the website and play for another 5-10 seconds. We want this transition to be smooth - I have some ideas on how I want it to look.

It is to be used as an asset we are preparing for our site as a portfolio piece.

Need fast delivery - we are looking for someone who can swiftly handle this short project and complete by Thursday, June 20th.

Thank you.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:56 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for YouTube Automation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor who can assist us in automating our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of YouTube platform and its algorithms. The primary task will be to edit videos for maximum visibility and engagement. This includes adding captions and annotations.  Scripts and voiceover will be provided, and the editor should be able to quickly turn them around with minimal supervision. Attention to detail and creativity are key. Experience with video editing software and knowledge of current trends in YouTube content is required.

I am looking to create videos like this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wRvubspNj6Q&t=6s

Videos are 40 minutes.

I will provide a 20 minute voiceover and script, your job is to edit that video and put clips in between like shown in the video to make it 40 minutes.

Please only apply if you have a good portfolio and have worked on YouTube automation channels before.





Budget: $15
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Podcast Editing and Production - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced podcast editor and producer to help us create a new podcast. The podcast will consist of video and audio content, with each episode being approximately 30 minutes long. As the editor and producer, your main responsibilities will include editing raw audio and video footage, adding background music and sound effects, and ensuring high-quality audio and video output. This is a great opportunity to work with a team of professionals and contribute to the success of an exciting new podcast.
Additionally we will need a short promo video/reel to promote the podcast.

Skills required:
- Podcast editing
- Adding title and write content (including use of SEO)
- Audio and video production
- Need to compile 2 camera views into 1.
- Sound design
- Adding intro and outro
- Creating the cover/preview of podcast
- Familiarity with podcasting platforms

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:51 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing, Audio Production, Video Editing & Production, Podcast Production, Audio Mastering
Skills: Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Post Production, Sound Mixing, Audio Production, Video Editing & Production, Podcast Production, Audio Mastering
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Explainer video animation - Upwork
item.description:
The ultimate communications and productivity platform
Built exclusively for your strata management company. Town Square streamlines operations with a suite of innovative features:

   Email replacement: Unlock inbox zero and say hello to streamlined conversations.
   Workflows: Automate your processes for peak efficiency
   Ticketing: Manage requests and issues with ease
   Task allocation: Delegate and track tasks with precision
   Committee chat room: Encourage committees to collaborate in a private space
   Management dashboard: Gain insights and oversee your business at a glance
   AI triage: Cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and machine learning prioritises and categorises enquiries for faster resolution
   And that’s not all… Uncover hidden features and surprises with Easter eggs that make strata management not just productive, but also delightful.

Town Square isn’t just a platform; it’s the future of strata management.

______________________________________________________


We’ve accessed over 100 years of combined owner’s corporation management experience and analysed over 250,000 interactions with owners and external stakeholders to engineer the Town Square software platform for the strata industry from the ground up.

We founded one of Australia’s fastest growing strata body corp management companies just to improve the Australian strata experience. We’ve been in your shoes, and we felt your pain!

Fast forward to today and we’ve spun out Town Square as a completely standalone cloud-based, software-as-a-service subscription platform. We never considered for a second keeping Town Square to ourselves, and we’ve spent the past five years (and some serious 💵 investment) to get it to where it is today.

______________________________________________________


Say goodbye to email (👋)
Sick of receiving hundreds of emails each day? Been there! Not to mention how many of them are just follow-ups. The Town Square ticketing system converts everything into tickets and merges duplicates into just one place.

Wave farewell to the email avalanche. We know the drill - your inbox is a maze of messages, and let’s not even start on the follow-ups. Enter Town Square’s ticketing system: your new command centre.

Unified inbox: Transform your communication chaos into organised tickets.
Merge duplicates: No more repetitive messages. Duplicates are seamlessly merged, keeping your focus sharp and your inbox clean.

We offer a variety of pre-configured filters to help you prioritise the tickets you could be working on each day. Of course, you can also customise your own sorting and filtering options and save them as custom views!

With Town Square, every ticket is a step towards simplicity. Say hello to efficiency and goodbye to email overload.



Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:42 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Maxon Cinema 4D, 3D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Web Design, Motion Design, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Music Video, Animation, Illustration, Trailer, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Maxon Cinema 4D, 3D Animation, Adobe After Effects, Web Design, Motion Design, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Music Video, Animation, Illustration, Trailer, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Country: AUS
click to apply

item.title: Cleaning up dust spots, small dirt and smudges from video - Upwork
item.description:
We have a high resolution product video that needs to be retouched and have some artefacts removed.

Video:
https://vimeo.com/960898509?share=copy

The vide is of a watch being unveiled from different angles. The watch however has:

-Dust and a small hair on the watch glass
-Small smudges on the bracelet
-Small smudges and sports on the hour indexes on the watch dial.

We require that the dust, smudges and dots be completely removed from the video. In particular:

-Clean up dust dots on the hour indexes on the watch dials (occurs throughout video)

-Remove hair on glass (occurs throughout but very visible at around 00:27 &00:36)

-Remove dust spots on glass (occurs throughout video)

-Cleanup smudges on polished bracelet (occurs around 00:30)

Please provide quote and timeframe for delivery (including first draft). If you have examples of your previous similar work is preferable. Thanks!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Rotoscoping, Video Cleanup, Video Enhancement, Motion Retouching, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Rotoscoping, Video Cleanup, Video Enhancement, Motion Retouching, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor (LOS) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:
Niche: BASKETBALL
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 8-15 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.
We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the BASKETBALL niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): CRAZY BAKSETBALL STORIES/FACTS
Would be great if you can make a 1 minute sample!
The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks
Here is an example of the type of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/yKTND_ikxlc?si=FSXJnzK5dVDKgorp
Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)
Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].
Start your bid with [Insert Random Word; Example: "Banana Milkshake"], so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.
Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
